name: sl6-x86-32-core
short_description:
Unofficial 

Scientific Linux /Redhat (based) EL7

Recompiled for 32bit.

Live ISO's and RPMs/SRPMs

Core Alpha RPMS/SRPMS to be released in :

Jan  2015
ISO's  release date TBD.

*This is not intended for end users. It is intended for developers and system builders.

This is one of my  community projects where I will release and hand over .......to the most qualified maintainer recommended to me.

Please note:
Once this hits RC stage , I'm off to another build project and this project is someone else's baby!

After the scrary note, just know others will be using 32bit so you will not be alone and you will have access to updated RPMS I predict through serveral areas. 
For PETE's sake just don't ask RH, Centos or SL directly for help on this, unless you get their OKAY first. 
The future upstream is =>64bit with multi-lib support for 32bit and/or even a 32bit DOM0(on 64bit host).
*Please work through 32bit community support channels for this type  of project.
